text: Ezɨ atrivim dɨmagarimɨn akar kam ini. Egha dɨkavigha uan gumazir dapanibav mɨgɨa ghaze, “Kɨ Sirian mɨdorozir gumazibar nɨghnɨzim gɨfo. Me kamaghɨn fo e daghebar otefe. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, me averpeniba ategha ghua, tuzir danganibar moga iti. Me ghaze, e nguibam ategh azenan mangɨtɨ, me en suigh en nguibar ekiam iniam.”
